name: CONGAPOSE
description:
PARTY OR DIE!

THE PARROT INSISTS!

Bring the party to the people! 

Build the longest Congaline with the PARTY PARROT in the lead! Move with W, A, S, D, to the rythm of the music and get near other people to join the Congaline! 

Be considerate and don't bump into other party guests as this is considered a dickmove in memeculture and makes people leave your line!

Made for the 2021GMTKJAM!
